org.sustudio.concise.core.collocation

Class TextualSentenceHighlighter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.vectorhighlight.FastVectorHighlighter
      • org.sustudio.concise.core.highlighter.Highlighter
        • org.sustudio.concise.core.concordance.ConcHighlighter
          • org.sustudio.concise.core.collocation.TextualHighlighter
            • org.sustudio.concise.core.collocation.TextualSentenceHighlighter

  • public class TextualSentenceHighlighter
extends TextualHighlighter
    應用 TextualSentenceFragmentsBuilder 建立起來的句子做的 Highlighter， 並根據 ConciseTokenAnalyzer 把裡頭的字詞換成 Token。
    Author:
    Kuan-ming Su
